amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds in contravention of existing law with respect to allocation of harbor maintenance trust fund resources and Army Corps of Engineers targets under WRRDA.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds in contravention of the Water Resources Reform and Development Act of 2014.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Brownley (CA) amendment (A030) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Brownley (CA) amendment (A030) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A030) offered by Ms. Brownley (CA).
